What sets cmdctr apart

A new operating model for the AI-native company.

Visual diagram of meta boxes/agents

Unified Meta Box Architecture

Every business function is a modular meta box, orchestrated by AI agents for seamless integration.

Real-Time Automation & Sync

Changes in one meta box are instantly reflected everywhere, keeping your entire company in sync.
